## 2 Google Suggest Chain Poems

```
1. Exist   ->  Existential Crisis
2. Crisis  ->  crisis meaning
3, Meaning ->  meaning in text
4. Text    ->  text message
```

```
1. Everybody -> Everybody loves someone
2. Someone   -> someone like you
3. Like      -> like a pipette crossword
```
